protocol_name: Protocols for "Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants"
protocol_name_html: Protocols for "Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants"
description:
These protocols accompany the following GigaScience publication:

 

Jihoon Jo, et al.  (2016): Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants. GigaScience...
protocol_affiliation: School of Biological Sciences and Technology, Chonnam National University
manuscript_citation: Jihoon Jo, Jooseong Oh, Hyun-Gwan Lee, Hyun-Hee Hong, Sung-Gwon Lee, Seongmin Cheon, Elizabeth M. A. Kern, Soyeong Jin, Sung-Jin Cho, Joong-Ki Park, Chungoo Park; Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants. Gigascience 2017; 6 (1): 1-6. doi: 10.1093/gigascience/giw006

protocols.protocol_name: Genomic DNA extraction from sea cucumber body-wall tissue
protocols.protocol_name_html: Genomic DNA extraction from sea cucumber body-wall tissue
protocols.description:
This is a DNA extraction protocol from sea cucumber (Apostichopus japonicus) body-wall tissue. It accompanies the following GigaScience publication:

 

Jihoon Jo, et al.  (2016): Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants. GigaScience...
protocols.authors: Jihoon Jo, Jooseong Oh, Hyun Gwan Lee, Hyun Hee Hong, Sung Gwon Lee, Seongmin Cheon, Elizabeth MA Kern, Soyeong Jin, Sung Jin Cho, Joong Ki Park, Chungoo Park
protocols.protocol_affiliation: School of Biological Sciences and Technology, Chonnam National University

groups.group_name: MinION user group for high molecular weight DNA extraction from all kingdoms

protocols.protocol_name: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
protocols.protocol_name_html: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome
protocols.description:
This protocol is for the whole genome de novo assembly and annotation for apostichopus japonicus genome, but can be useful in other marine invertebrate genomes. It accompanies the following GigaScience publication:

 

Jihoon Jo, et al.  (2016): Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants. GigaScience...
protocols.authors: Jihoon Jo, Jooseong Oh, Hyun Gwan Lee, Hyun Hee Hong, Sung Gwon Lee, Seongmin Cheon, Elizabeth MA Kern, Soyeong Jin, Sung Jin Cho, Joong Ki Park, Chungoo Park
protocols.protocol_affiliation: School of Biological Sciences and Technology, Chonnam National University

versions.protocol_name_html: Whole genome de-novo assembly and annotation protocol for Apostichopus japonicus genome

protocols.protocol_name: SNPs calling of Apostichopus japonicus color-variants genome
protocols.protocol_name_html: SNPs calling of Apostichopus japonicus color-variants genome
protocols.description:
SNPs calling protocol for analysis the genetic polymorphism among natural color variants. This protocol accompanies the following GigaScience publication:

 

Jihoon Jo, et al.  (2016): Draft genome of the sea cucumber Apostichopus japonicus and genetic polymorphism among color variants. GigaScience...
protocols.authors: Jihoon Jo, Jooseong Oh, Hyun Gwan Lee, Hyun Hee Hong, Sung Gwon Lee, Seongmin Cheon, Elizabeth MA Kern, Soyeong Jin, Sung Jin Cho, Joong Ki Park, Chungoo Park
protocols.protocol_affiliation: School of Biological Sciences and Technology, Chonnam National University
